menuItems._comment: You can also use the word 'Account' if it fits better in your language

buttons._comment: This is a verb. Example: _Chirp_ this. Do not translate it to the sound a bird makes.
This is a verb. Example: _Like_ this post
This is a verb. Example: _Rechirp_ this post
This is a verb. Example: _Reply_ to this tweet

_comment: This is an ammount. Example: 1 _chirp_ Do not translate it to the sound a bird makes.
This is an ammount. Example: 12 _chirps_ Do not translate it to the sound a bird makes.
highTrafficMessage:
We're experiencing very high traffic right now.
chirp is trying his best, but if Chirp slows down, don't panic!

_comment: Do not translte this to the sound a bird makes. Keep 'chirp' a verb but make sure it sounds good in your languge
LetsCreateAnAccount: Let's create an account for you!
ChirpIsInviteOnly: Chirp is invite only for the time being. You'll need an invite code to create an account.
DontHaveInviteCode: Don't have an invite code? You can get one by sending a DM on Twitter to @actuallyaridan or @use_chirp.
YoureCurrentlyUsing: You're currently using a guest account
YouCantInteract: You can't interact with chirps or post any of your own. You can't follow accounts either.
NeedToCreateAnAccountInstead: Need to create an account instead?
suspendedMessage: This account has been suspended. Chirp regularly suspends accounts that break our rules.
chirpHasSearched: Chirpie has searched everywhere but can't find what you were looking for.
noMessagesText:
Seems like you don't have any messages!
Why don't you go interact with someone?
noMoreChirps: If you want to use the Following tab you need to follow people first! üòù
noNotifs: Seems like you don't have any notifications! Why don't you go interact with someone?
